extendedInfo.description: No app about math has ever been this short and easy!The âMath in 1 minuteâ app consists of short videos that will help you to remember and understand mathematics better. You will find explanations on common math topics, from primary to high school, from the simplest problems to more challenging concepts, all explained in a quick and easy way, for you to succeed in math. The first time you view the videos you have to be online, but after the first download the videos are available on your phone also without Internet connection. This gives you a unique opportunity to carry this tool around in your pocket and to view it exactly where and when you need it. This is the best way to remember how to solve mathematical problems, when you are doing your homework, just before an exam or in any other situations where you need to remember some simple ways to tackle your mathematical problems. This should be a mandatory tool for students as well as teachers, parents and others who help children and adolescents with mathematics.  Just download it and see it for yourself.Topics covered: learn math, math help, mathematics, test, algebra, equations, percentage, teacher, education, school, exam, math teacher, easy math, math video, fraction, percentage, plus, geometry, square root, calculation, multiplication, exam preparation, math exam, exponents, minus, division, repetition, math test, easy math, math video, math film

reviews.title: Paid app
reviews.comment: Would prefer if there was an option to buy the app with everything instead of these microtransactions. The explanations and videos available in the free app seem ok but rather underwhelming, compared to the level of TedEd and Dragonbox. As a teacher, I doubt I\'d recommend these for my students since there are plenty of decent YouTube tutorials for these things.
reviews.author: Ole Larssen

reviews.title: Brilliant!!
reviews.comment: This app is excellent for helping kids with their homework and for us adults to remember things we used to know but have forgotten. Excellent app, thanks!
